title: Jim Mahfood - Grrl Scouts V2 Work Sucks
description:
I can't seem to locate my physical copy of Grrl Scouts V1, which I was going to scan. But until then, I'm still on my mission to present more Jim Mahfood, so here's V2 (not scanned by me).

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Issues 1-4 of 'Grrl Scouts - Work Sucks'

Image Comics, 2003, 

Written and Illustrated by Jim Mahfood, with pin-ups by Jose Garibaldi, Dave Crosland, Farel Dalrymple, Jim Campbell, Rob Schrab, Kieron Dwyer, Douglas TenNapel, Michael Avon Oeming

When word around the hood spreads about the Grrls' illegal endeavors, Gwen, Daphne and Rita are forced to go legit and get real jobs. Rita uses her artistic talent to hook-up with a local graffiti crew and finds love along the way. Meanwhile, Daphne encounters the horrors of working behind a bar at the Weird Hog and Gwen struggles and strives through the monotony of "normal" employment until she finds what could be her true calling.
